code: /** @format */import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import ReactPaginate from"react-paginate";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getpage}from"../Redux/actions/moviesAction";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=()=>{const[totalPages,setTotalPages]=useState(10);const dispatchAllMoveis=useDispatch();const total=useSelector(state=>state.pageCount);useEffect(()=>{setTotalPages(total);},[]);const pageCount=totalPages;const handelPageClick=data=>{dispatchAllMoveis(getpage(data.selected+1));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row  my-4 font",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactPaginate,{breakLabel:"...",nextLabel:"\u0627\u0644\u062A\u0627\u0644\u064A",pageRangeDisplayed:0,previousLabel:"\u0627\u0644\u0633\u0627\u0628\u0642",marginPagesDisplayed:1,pageCount:pageCount,onPageChange:handelPageClick,containerClassName:"pagination d-flex flex-wrap  justify-content-center pe-0",pageClassName:"page-item",pageLinkClassName:"page-link fs-5",nextClassName:"page-item",nextLinkClassName:"page-link fs-5",previousClassName:"page-item",previousLinkClassName:"page-link fs-5",breakClassName:"page-item",breakLinkClassName:"page-link fs-5",activeClassName:"active"})})})});};export default Pagination;
